alert.note: Alert for Cass; Pulaski; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 10:56PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Indiana, including the following counties, Cass IN, Pulaski and White. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1054 PM EDT, Additional scattered showers and thunderstorms are expected through the early overnight. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen this evening in the warned area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monticello, Royal Center, Burnettsville, Bell Center, Headlee, Thornhope, Lake Cicott, Star City, Sitka, Buffalo, Lucerne, Indiana Beach, Norway and Leases Corner. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
